author: GameSpot
description:
The Future Games Show at gamescom starts at 11am PDT / 2pm EDT / 7pm BST / 8pm CEST / 2am CST* on Wednesday, August 20.

This year’s Future Games Show at gamescom is immediately followed by FGS Live from gamescom. This expansion showcase is hosted by FGS channel presenters Jules and Nathan, and will provide even more wishlist-expanding gaming news and world premiere trailers.
title: Future Games Show at gamescom 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Join us on Thursday, August 21, at 6am PDT / 9am EDT / 2pm BST / 3pm CEST as we dive into even more exciting titles coming to Xbox.
Thursday’s show features Ninja Gaiden 4, Overwatch 2, The Outer Worlds 2, and more. Expect fresh gameplay, developer insights, new trailers, and a few surprises along the way.
title: Xbox @ gamescom Broadcast 2025 | Day 2 (Ninja Gaiden 4, Overwatch 2, The Outer Worlds 2)

author: GameSpot
description:
Join us on Wednesday, August 20, at 6am PDT / 9am EDT / 2pm BST / 3pm CEST, as we go live with a closer look at some of the biggest games coming to Xbox. Expect first-look gameplay, developer interviews, fresh trailers, and updates from our first-party studios and partners around the world.

Day 1 features the ROG Xbox Ally handhelds, Grounded 2, Keeper, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, and more.
title: Xbox @ gamescom Broadcast 2025 | Day 1 (Black Ops 7, ROG Xbox Ally handhelds, Grounded 2, Keeper)

author: GameSpot
description: Live from Cologe, Germany join Geoff Keighley and Sjokz for gamescom Opening Night Live 2025, featuring the worldwide reveal of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, a new reveal from Resident Evil Requiem and more. Streaming live Tuesday, August 19 at 8p CEST / 7p BST / 2p ET / 11a PT.
title: gamescom Opening Night Live 2025 (Black Ops 7, Resident Evil Requiem)

author: GameSpot
description:
"If you want to WIN, you gotta pick a good pair of pants" - Mahatma Gandhi

#switch2 #dragxdrive #nintendo #gaming
title: What Pants You Wear MATTER For This game | DRAG X DRIVE Pants META TIER LIST

author: GameSpot
description: Jake got hands on time with Pokemon Legends: Z-A, the latest Pokemon game coming to the Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2. Here are his early impressions.
title: Pokemon Legends Z-A - The Biggest Pokemon Shake Up In Decades!
